text: Mission in Kabul () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Leonid Kvinikhidze.Вперед к «Амурской осени»МИССИЯ В КАБУЛЕ It stars Oleg Zhakov, Irina Miroshnichenko, and Gleb Strizhenov. == Actors == * Oleg Zhakov as Pyotr Petrovich Sorokin * Irina Miroshnichenko as Marina Arkadyevna Luzhina * Gleb Strizhenov as Gedeonov * Emmanuil Vitorgan as Kalnin * Oleg Vidov as Skazkin (voiced by Alexander Demyanenko) * Mikhail Gluzsky as Garri == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 adventure movies Category:1970 drama movies Category:1970s mystery movies Category:Russian adventure movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Kvinikhidze Category:Movies set in Afghanistan
title: Mission in Kabul
